Reviews.Title: Not very good
Reviews.Author: R. Herman
Reviews.Content: I received this back in October and I can almost never use it now. I keep getting errors on it and they don't go away even after taking the batteries out.  Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: V. Arnold
Reviews.Content: Just bought this camera at a discount retailer for under $20 and am taking it back.  Bought it for our young child to play with and it just frustrates her, and us.  It has a long lag time and it is even hard to shut off.  Not worth the money!
